==================
on_edit_form_shown
==================

on_edit_form_shown(item)

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Item class </refs/client/item_api>`

Description
===========

The **on_edit_form_shown** event is triggered by the 
:doc:`create_edit_form <m_create_edit_form>`
method when the form has been shown.

The ``item`` parameter is the item that triggered the event.
